review_blob: Looks clean, tastes like nothing. Slight head that disappears rapidly. Ditto the hop truck comment! Sounds like the brewer has plenty of excuses but theres no excuse for putting this stuff on a shelf.
Unremarkable black beer. Bitter, grainy flavor with virtually no aroma. Infected even? The microbrew shakeout didnt catch this one, unfortunately.

If I could rate zero for appearance I would. This stuff should have been put through a strainer first. Its not Cave Creek, which sucks, but its even worse. Sour, vinegar aftertaste. Someone should arrest these brewers for crimes against beer.

Sampled this at a beer tasting this summer. Im surprised they can give it away. Poured a fair head that vanished almost immediately, just like the flavor. Decent color. Way out of balance. And maple? What maple? Must be a marketing gimmick. Bitter finish, then sour aftertaste.
